SummaryEnglish: Adapted from the dynamic manga "Wolf Girl Blue" by Amori. Cang Lan, a girl with superpowers, arrives at Bianshan High School in search of her missing friend. There, she meets a cast of intriguing characters, including Lin Yang, a figure from urban legends; Tai Ji, a seasoned gamer; and Wei Shishi, a shy yet talented girl. Together, they delve into a series of bizarre incidentsâ€”such as a double-faced teacher, a man who never sleeps, a flawless perfect boy, and a potted sister. What hidden conspiracies are lurking behind these strange occurrences?
